protection-indicator-explanation-cascadi:
Informational text show to user on clicking on the protection icons. $1 represents the action, $2 represents the level of protection, $3 is the timestamp of expiry.
Message supports wikitext.
The protection is a cascading protection.

Message supports wikitext.
The protection is a cascading protection.

protection-indicator-reason-wrapper: Wrapper text for the reason. $1 is the protecting user $2 is the reason.
protection-indicator-protection-log-link: The text of a link that will point to the protection log of the particular page.
